resources.string: Failed to communicate with device! Please replug the power cord of the device and try again.
"Invalid Wi-Fi password input for last enrollment. Please ensure you input a correct password.
"The Wi-Fi name you entered last time cannot be found. Make sure to enter a right Wi-Fi name.
"The Wi-Fi name you entered last time cannot be found. Make sure to enter a right Wi-Fi name.
Unactivated account! Please activate your account first. If you encountered problems when activating your account, please contact customer care.
Failed to sign in! Invalid mobile number or password.
Failed to change password! Invalid old password.
Passwords don\'t match! Please retype and try again.
Failed to delete device(s)! Please try again.
You can only read device data.
You can only read group data.
You cannot enroll a device which has been shared to you!
You cannot update Wi-Fi info of a shared device!
Operation time out! Please try again.
Your SMS should arrive in 1 minute.
Failed to send out verification code!
This group name is already taken. Please enter a different one.
Please ungroup this master device and then try to delete it. This operation will ungroup this group.
Set a reservation time. Air purifier devices will clean air at a time set in advance. It’ll keep air clean before the reservation time.
Reservation time has been set. Air purifier devices will clean air at a time set in advance. It’ll keep air clean before the reservation time.
Cannot set arrival time within 30 minutes. Please set a longer time.
All of air purifier devices are offline. If they\'re still offline till reservation time, reservation will not take effect.
Please enter the password of your Wi-Fi and then tap Next button.
Align device QR code within frame to scan
This device doesn’t support Wi-Fi. It cannot be enrolled to app.
You can try solutions as below or call Customer Care directly.
1. You may entered a wrong password. Please tap Retry button in the bottom to enter password again.
2. Please check if the blue button in the picture below is light up. If not, please press and hold the button for 3 seconds until hear a chime, and then retry.
"4. You can also contact customer care."
"3. This device only support 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network. Please ensure your mobile phone is connected to a 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network."
This device is already in your account. Do you want to update Wi-Fi configuration of this device?
Wi-Fi configuration has been updated successfully.
Allow H Plus access to your camera in system privacy settings to start scanning QR code.
Allow H Plus access to phone services in system settings to dial.
It seems you\'ve already signed up. Please sign in directly.
Your SMS should arrive in 1 minute. If there is a delay or you require support, please call Customer Care between 9am – 6pm, Mon-Sat.
Cannot access to location services, allow H Plus access to Location Services in System Settings to continue the enrollment.
Location services off, turn on Location Services in System Settings to continue the enrollment.
A controller can view running status of shared devices and also perform remote control.
An observer can only view running status of shared devices
Invitation has been sent out successfully.
Device sharing has been revoked successfully.
Failed to remove device. Please try again.
Failed to revoke authorization. Please try again.
Failed to send invitation. Please try again.
You can only share to one contact.
%s is not a H Plus user yet. Please ask this contact to register as a H Plus user and then try again.
Device sharing requires version 3.5.0 or higher. Please make sure the contact use a right version or they cannot accept your invitation.
Remove shared device \"%s\" from your account?
You cannot share device to yourself.
Are you sure to delete this device? This operation will revoke sharing of this device if you shared it to other users. It may take several minutes.
This push notification requires a higher version. Update now?
You don\'t have the permission to view filters currently.
This device requires a newer version. Please update your app.
Failed to fetch device support info! Please try again.
Select the product you want to add.
You may experience enrollment failures on a few mobile devices if cellular data is turned ON. Please turn OFF cellular data (2G/3G/4G) on your mobile phone and try device enrollment.
Please connect your mobile phone to Wi-Fi first and then switch back to app.
Network unavailable! Please connect to internet first.
You have to select at least one master device(Air Touch-X, Air Touch-X2, Air Touch-X3) to create a group.
Move selected devices out of group \"%1s\"?
The device(s) you selected include master device of this group.Moving out master device will ungroup these devices. Are yousure to move out selected device(s)?
Some devices didn\'t respond to group control!
By clicking the \"Next\" button, you agree to Honeywell\'s Privacy Policy and EULA.
Reset password failed! User \"%s\" was not found.
Reset password failed! Password is not valid.
This device is already in your account. Do you want to update Wi-Fi configuration of this device?
It seems you haven\'t registered yet. Please sign up first.
Cannot reset password for enterprise account! Please contact customer care.
Oops! Cannot delete a home with devices enrolled. Please delete devices first to proceed.
Oops! This home cannot be found.
Tap the button below to add home.
"Scenarios are not available for shared home"
No controllable devices!\nScenarios are not available.

Cannot communicate with device! To ensure your phone has been connected to device AP, Go to system Wi-Fi settings and select device SSID \"%1$s XXXXXX\". If you cannot find the SSID. You can try to press and hold Wi-Fi button on device for %2$s seconds.
"Device error detected!\nGo to Devices tab to check detail."
"Unsupported device detected!\nGo to Devices tab to check detail."
Tap the button above to add device.
Running out! Need a new one.
Remote control was disabled on your device. You can enable it by pressing remote control button on device.
1.Power supply of your device was cut off.
2.Your Wi-Fi network may be turned off.
3.Your device is out of Wi-Fi cover range.
4.Your Wi-Fi network password was changed. To make your device online, you can update Wi-Fi info.
Modes are not available if device is power off. You can turn on your device by pressing power button.
Extract QR code to download app.
All devices didn\'t respond to scenario control!
Some devices didn\'t respond to scenario control!
Scenario control failed! Please try again.
This device requires newer version app. Please update.
Cannot communicate with device! Please re-plug power cord, then press and hold Wi-Fi button on device for %1$s seconds to retry.
Network is off! Please turn it on.
Are you sure to clear selected message(s)?
Are you sure to clear all messages?
This message requires newer version app. Please update your app to load this message.
Cannot find this device! Maybe it has been deleted from your account.
Please plug device power cord to socket and make sure device is powered on. After that, press and hold Wi-Fi button on device for 3 seconds until hear one chime.
Please plug device power cord to socket and make sure device is powered on. After that, press and hold Wi-Fi button on device for 10 seconds until hear two chime.
To exchange data with device, your phone has to be connected to device AP.
Where do you want to put your device? You can select an existed one or create a new one.
Give your device a name so that you can distinguish it from other devices.
Registering this device to your account. This may take one or two minutes. Please wait.
Device has been added successfully! You can go to Devices tab to check device info now.
Registering device time out! Tap Retry button to try again. If it keeps failed, please contact customer care for help.
We encountered a problem when registering this device. Please contact customer care for help.

Failed to fetch enrollment result! You probably input a wrong Wi-Fi password or network of your phone is not stable. Please check if can find this device in Device tab. If not, please try to enroll device again.
Failed to add device! You can try to add device again. If it keeps failed, please contact customer care for help.
You can find the QR code in these places:
1. You might choosed a wrong Wi-Fi network or entered a wrong password. In this case, you can tap Retry button to retry.
Please connect your phone to an available network first.
Your phone has been connected to an available network. Tap the button below to continue.
Your phone might be still connected to device Wi-Fi AP. You may need to switch to previous network to get internet access.
Failed to connect device to server! Please replug the power cord of the device and try again.
We\'ll connect the device to the same Wi-Fi network as your mobile phone\'s.
This operation may take about 1 minute, please wait.
As below is a list of all supported Wi-Fi networks scanned by device. Please select one of them to connect.
Device will be connected to this selected Wi-Fi network.
You might choose a wrong device or your device Wi-Fi AP is off. Please try gain.
Now you can see historical data statistics include curve chart and bar chart for air and water purifier devices.
If you encountered any problems while using this app, or if you have any advices about this app, please don\'t hesitate to tell us.
Want to try first? Try now.
You\'re about to try virtual devices. Please notice that these virtual devices are only for demonstration purpose. Some functions may perform differently than using real devices.
Press and hold power button until power light flickering.
Please turn on bluetooth of your phone so that app can scanning devices.
Give your device a name so that you can distinguish it from other devices.
Failed to find the device! You can try steps below to retry.
This device requires Android 4.3 or above.
1. Make sure your device is power on. If not, you can press and hold power button until hear a chime and power light is flickering.\n\n2. Keep your device close to your phone.
This device has already been enrolled by you!
Turn on bluetooth of you phone.
Power mask on and keep it close.
PM 2.5 value of your city will be used to calculate filtered particular matters of mask devices. Changing city may cause a wrong calculation. Please make sure you select the right city.
Locating failed! Tap the button below to add a city.
Deleting this device will also remove all of its data from your phone. Are you sure to proceed?
Tap here to quit demo mode
If indoor air quality is worse than outdoor, it could be possibly caused by new decoration, smoking etc, or even expired filters.
If filtered water quality is worse than original, it could possibly caused by expired filters or pipes in device is too dirty.
Device offline will make line discontinuous. Please keep device online to maintain continuous data.
Device offline will make original TDS data discontinuous. No water use in a day will make filtered TDS data discontinuous.
Allow H Plus access to Storage in system Settings
Make sure filter is mounted and wear mask firmly.
Purified Water volume is calculated by Honeywell water purifiers. Total purified volume means a sum of volume since you enrolled Honeywell water purifiers in this home.
PM2.5 Device Average is average daily indoor PM2.5 value detected by Honeywell air purifier devices in this home.
PM2.5 City Average is average daily based PM2.5 value of your city. The data is provided by third party data provider Thinkpage.

Filter Particles weight is calculated by detected PM2.5 value, air volume and device running time etc. It is an emulated value and may not equal to the real weight of filtered particles. Total weight means a sum of weight since you enrolled Honeywell air purifiers in this home.
